fields.title: Fields
fields.description: List of top level fields to include for flattening. Supports * wildcards, except when used on internal fields. Defaults to empty array which means all fields.

errorMessage.pattern: Internal fields cannot be used with wildcards

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix string for flattened field names. Defaults to empty.

depth.title: Depth
depth.description: Number representing the nested levels to consider for flattening. Defaults to 5. Minimum should be 1.

delimiter.title: Delimiter
delimiter.description: Delimiter to be used for flattening. Defaults to underscore.
